segments.text: Judy , what is everybody talking about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haven ’ t you heard ? Richard was fired by our manager .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re kidding . It can ’ t be true .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Believe it or not . Everybody is talking about it in the company .
segments.speaker: S2
